scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm run dev" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
